title: AHS: DOUBLE FEATURE Trailer Breakdown - Red Tide Part 1
author: Think Story
comment:
Absolutely PUMPED for this new season of AHS! What did you guys think of the trailer?

Check out my previous season playlists here:
AH: Stories Playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7ihqh_gUXplZhxSuQkmfdk0

They finally fired the cinematographer for s6-9 so we're back to the darker look of the first 5 seasons! This season looks like it has a more serious tone and I really hope it will be as the show has been getting wayyy too campy and comedic (though I still enjoy it)
I want a season where the death of characters actually matters and means something again.
Roanoke was super underrated, I’d love some type of crossover with that season. But I’d also love if this season was super standalone.

Fun fact: AHS Double Feature was originally going to begin filming in March 2020 (extremely early for AHS). At the time, Lily Rabe was pregnant and Im sure Ryan Murphy knew this and added it to her character so she could still be involved in a main role in the season. They began filming in the beginning of 2021 when Lily had already given birth so either they couldn't change the script or maybe the baby does play a bigger role 🤔
description:
In this video we break down all the hidden clues, easter eggs, and theories for the upcoming season of American Horror Story: Double Feature. This trailer breakdown is for Part 1 Red Tide.
